row.entry: This module boost highlights and softly blooms them over the image hence the name of the effect. There are numerous ways to use this module dependent on the image's actual scenery lighting.

sect4.title: Usage
sect4.para: Starting from the default settings change the strength value for a pleasent look, then change the size to control the spread of light.

sect5.title: size
sect5.para: Represents the spatial extent of the bloom effect.

sect5.title: threshold
sect5.para: Set the threshold for the increase in brightness.

sect5.title: strength
sect5.para: Set the strength of overlightning for the effect.

entry.para: This is the original image, use it as reference for the changes below...
Here we have choosen to use a size of 10%, which is a rather small radius for the soft light spread. We boosted up the strength to 50% for a more exaggerated effect.
